* Zyber nodded as she cames up behind Rowdy Wolf, she also like to speak to 
another after a long while of solitude.
She smiled as she looked around at the den, quite a cosy little place it 
was.*

" Yes, it is always good to speak to others and have company. It is not only 
a way to know what is going on in the world but it also eases the stress of 
a hard day."

* She twitched her tail this way and that, it was always good to have 
someone to talk to.*
